properties.name: value
properties.description: set initial value for the input

properties.name: help
properties.description: help line (element for display during focus)

properties.name: validator
properties.description: can be used to perform enable advanced validations

properties.name: title
properties.description: accessibility helper (doubles as error for pattern)

properties.name: onChange
properties.description: called onChange(value) when input value changes

properties.name: onEnter
properties.description: called onEnter(value) when enter key is pressed

properties.name: icon
properties.description: icon to be pre-pended to the input
